Posts.Content: Hi Joanne The best thing to do is ask.your questions, get everything in open,if you have imformation your mind will stop wondering and going over things.Ask and know. I have read up on lumpectomy as well,ask and I will tell you what I have found out. All the best. Alfieval

Posts.Content: Hi Joanne. Wish I could help,my surgery is on Monday.My thoughts are with you it will be good to get it over with.I know they won't tell you anything and you don't want to make decisions. Just keep thinking a week from tomorrow it will all be over,and keep fingers and toes crossed. I will be praying for you. All the very best. Alfieval

Posts.Content: Hi Dreamtheif. Thanks for that info but I have already ready all those messages from" pain after lumpectomy " Lots of them in pain after surgery and pain from snb, My surgeon told me those problems were very rare after snb but from what I have read lots of ladies are having pain and effects after snb.I had decided to have it now I'm back to worrying about it and my surgery is only a week away. I was on scared group,but started receiving message from lots of groups.They are now in my mind and I'm very worried. Alfieval

Posts.Content: Hi 680511. Talking about post surgery exercises. I'm having mastectomy with snb on 16th June.scared because I have fibromyalgia and a painful shoulder on side of surgery..Went to see my GP,I can't believe what he said," You can only do what you can do" So if it's to painful to do exercises don't do them and end up with problems afterwards. What kind of answer is that.Not happy. Alfieval

Posts.Content: Hi I'm really worried now,I have Been receiving lots of emails from pain after lumpectomy group. Lots of ladies having pain after snb. I am going for mastectomy with snb soon and these messages are really scaring me. So many people with problems after snb I thought it was rare to have these problems after snb,but so many of you are having them. I started on scared group,but all these other groups have been poring onto my emails about pain and problems after surgery and snb. Really scared now. Alfieval

Posts.Title: Really scared

Posts.Content: Hi Margr. It was my Alfie who found my cancer.He wouldn't leave that side alone. One morning I woke up and saw a yellow scab on my nipple,went to GP I told her that Alfie must has scratched me,but she sent me to hospital to get it looked at.I told them the same story but they gave me mamagram and found to places so had to have biopsy in two places in breast and one nipple biopsy( ouch) . The breast biopsy showed two cancers, the nipple was negative,so my Alfie did scratch me. If he hadn't done that I wouldn't have known that I had cancer,clever Alfie ha ha.
